snippet: Pennsylvania Station may be getting some work done in the hopes of making Manhattan’s most dismal gateway a little less so.
abstract: Editorial welcomes news that Pennsylvania Station in New York City may be getting some work done to make it less dismal.
lead_paragraph: Pennsylvania Station may be getting some work done in the hopes of making Manhattan’s most dismal gateway a little less so.

headline.seo: Better Than Awful, Less Than Grand
headline.main: Better Than Awful, Less Than Grand
headline.print_headline: Better Than Awful, Less Than Grand
